text: bilateral tympanostomy with myringotomy tube placement
context: bilateral tympanostomy with myringotomy tube placement.
anesthesia: total iv general mask airway.
the cerumen from the external auditory canals were removed with a cerumen loop to #5 suction.

text: no signs of any gross retracted pockets or cholesteatoma
context: the tympanic membrane is then brought into direct visualization with no signs of any gross retracted pockets or cholesteatoma.
the middle ear was then suctioned with a #5 suction demonstrating dry contents.
cortisporin otic drops were placed followed by cotton balls.
the patient was sent home with a prescription for ciloxan ear drops to be used as directed and with instructions not to get any water in the ears.
